Header: Army Rugby Team Wins in First Inter Club League
Content: Army rugby players in the Dialog ‘A’ Division Inter Club Rugby League (1st round) in a show of excellence during the match at Air Force grounds on Sunday (18) beat their Air Force rivals to 29 - 21 and claimed a resounding victory. At half time Army players led the fray collecting 19 points to 14. As expected, both teams threw a spectacular display but Army players posed a formidable challenge as the match began again after the intermission. Their attack and defence strategies emerged victorious as the final segment was reaching amid roaring applause of the spectators.
